name: Infernal Shooting Room
description:
Fight as enemies continue appearing while objects bounce around and explode. Enemies spawn by waves and you have to kill them by shooting, causing explosions or throwing objects at them.

Created in under a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 where the theme was "Let there be chaos".

Controls:

-wasd: Move

-Left click: Shoot

-Space bar: Dash
